channel.title: Two Whonix Gateways?
channel.description:
Can I run multiple Whonix Gateways?
Can I have one on Internal Network "Whonix" and one on "Whonix2"? Then have one workstation on the "Whonix" internal network, and another workstation on the "Whonix2" internal network?
I realize I can have mutliple workstations on the same gateway, but I'm playing around with various configurations (VPN and not) and it would be nice to have both available.
Just curious this is safe or not, e.g. if it breaks something inside of the gateway if I rename the internal network and run two gateways simultaneously.

item.title: Two Whonix Gateways?

item.description:

item.title: Two Whonix Gateways?
item.dc:creator: rob75
item.description:
Can I run multiple Whonix Gateways?

Can I have one on Internal Network “Whonix” and one on “Whonix2”?
Then have one workstation on the “Whonix” internal network, and another workstation on the “Whonix2” internal network?

I realize I can have mutliple workstations on the same gateway, but I’m playing around with various configurations (VPN and not) and it would be nice to have both available.

Just curious this is safe or not, e.g. if it breaks something inside of the gateway if I rename the internal network and run two gateways simultaneously.
